nodes.text: Sergeant Baras Perosei was a male Human from the planet of Naboo who served as a Palace Guard of the Royal Naboo Security Forces.

During the Trade Federation's occupation of Naboo, Perosei was held prisoner at Camp Four until he was rescued by the Naboo Resistance, led by Lieutenant Gavyn Sykes. During the Battle of Naboo, he helped Queen Padmé Amidala capture the Neimoidian Viceroy Nute Gunray.
Perosei was known to be able to assemble and disassemble a S-5 heavy blaster pistol in less than sixty seconds.
